title: Real-Time 2-Way Speech Translator
summary: Low-latency English <-> Mandarin speech translator with streaming transcription, automatic language detection, and natural voice synthesis
description:
Production-ready, low-latency speech translation app enabling real-time English <-> Mandarin conversations. The system streams microphone audio to a custom WebSocket server, performs live transcription with interim results, translates in context, and synthesizes speech back to the user.

**Key Technical Achievements:**
- Bidirectional audio streaming with a custom Node.js WebSocket server
- Deepgram Nova-3 streaming transcription at 16kHz linear16 with endpointing
- Automatic language detection per utterance (English/Mandarin)
- GPT-4o-mini translation with streaming UI updates
- Sequential TTS playback queue to prevent overlap

**Performance:**
- End-to-end response under 2s in typical conversations
- Chunked audio processing and buffering for low latency

**Frontend Architecture:**
- React hooks for streaming pipeline, transcription, audio capture, and voice detection
- Real-time UI state machine (idle -> listening -> translating -> speaking)
- Progressive transcript and translation rendering

**Backend Integration:**
- WebSocket proxy for audio streaming
- Multiple concurrent API connections (Deepgram + OpenAI)
- Robust error handling and connection lifecycle management
